I am the virtual spokesperson for GroundsKeeper Coffee Supply, Co.!
I am here to answer any of your questions concerning our business.
I am also able to answer your general coffee-related queries.

patterns: What kinds of coffee do you sell?
What kinds of coffee do you have?
What kinds of coffee do you supply
What does GroundsKeeper Coffee, Co. sell?
What kinds of coffee does GroundsKeeper Coffee, Co. sell?
What kinds of coffee does GroundsKeeper Coffee, Co. have?
What kinds of coffee does GroundsKeeper Coffee, Co. supply?
responses:
We offer large-scale coffee bean supplies in a variety of coffee bean types.
We primarily sell Aribica beans grown in Central and South America; however, we also sell a few Ethiopian coffee species.

patterns: What do you take as payment?

responses: We accept cash, personal checks, credit, PayPal, and CashApp.

responses: Shipping will take approximately 2 - 6 days, depending on your location.

responses: Shipping cost depends entirely on the size of the shipment and your location.

patterns: When can I speak to a representative?

When can I talk with a person
When is GroundsKeeper Coffee, Co. open

What time can I contact you?
responses: We are open from 5 AM to 7 PM, Monday through Friday. You may speak with a representative during those hours at 1-800-GROUNDS.

patterns: I don't know what an espresso is
Can you tell me more about the espresso
I'm not sure what an espresso is
responses: Espresso is a coffee-making method of Italian origin, in which a small amount of nearly boiling water is forced under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.

patterns: I don't know what a cappuccino is
Can you tell me more about the cappuccino
I'm not sure what a cappuccino is
responses: A cappuccino is an espresso-based coffee drink that originated in Italy, and is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam.

patterns: I don't know what a macchiato is

responses: Caff√® macchiato, sometimes called espresso macchiato, is an espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed.
